00035 Object3D* ObstacleModel::GetClosestObstacle(CvPoint2D32f p, double maxDistance) {
00036         double min_dist = INT_MAX;
00037         Object3D *obst = NULL;
00038         for (int i=0; i < obstacle.GetCount(); i++) {
00039                 CvPoint3D32f p3 = obstacle[i]->GetCenter();
00040                 double dist = d(cvPoint2D32f(p3.x, p3.y), p);
00041                 if (dist < min_dist) {
00042                         min_dist = dist;
00043                         obst = obstacle[i];
00044                 }
00045         }
00046         if (min_dist < maxDistance)
00047                 return obst;
00048         else 
00049                 return NULL;
00050 }
